jd: From: Danish Iqbal, siri Info Solutions Inc danish.iqbal@siriinfo.com Reply to: danish.iqbal@siriinfo.com Hello Dear,Hope You’re Doing Well!!My name is Danish Iqbal and I am a Staffing Specialist at SIRI INFO. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients.Job Title: Full-Stack Software EngineersJob Location: RemoteJob Duration: Contract Visa:-HIBRate:- $50/hr on C2C Experience: 6+ years in .NET developmentSkills: Proficient in C# and SQL3+ years of experience in building cloud-native applicationsSoftware design and documentation skills a plus. Responsibilities: Front-End: Develop responsive web interfaces using modern frameworks and libraries, including Angular, Typescript and Blazor.Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize for performanceCollaborate with UX/UI designers to implement user-friendly featuresMaintain and improve existing front-end codebasesBack-End: Design and implement robust APIs and background services using .NETManage and optimize SQL Server database schemas and T-SQL queriesIntegrate third-party services and APIsExperience with cloud migrations and containers a plus.General: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new featuresEnsure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applicationsIdentify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugsHelp maintain code quality, organization, and automation
